meta.name: Multi-Platform Price Finder: Scraping Prices with Bright Data, Claude AI & Telegram

name: Multi-Platform Price Finder: Scraping Prices with Bright Data & Telegram

parameters.content:
üîé Multi-Platform Product Price Scraper (Amazon, eBay, Etsy, Target, BestBuy, Home Depot)

In this section, the workflow performs keyword-based product scraping across multiple e-commerce platforms using Bright Data. Each row follows the same structure:

Trigger Bright Data scrape via API

Check progress until snapshot is ready

Retrieve structured product data

Update Google Sheet with URL, Title & Price

‚öôÔ∏è Platforms handled: Amazon, eBay, Etsy, Target, BestBuy, Home Depot
Combines all results from different platforms into one stream for further processing.
Scans all merged product data and identifies the product with the lowest price. Returns title, price, and URL with a formatted message.
Uses Anthropic Chat Model to write a short promotional message based on the lowest price product. Keeps the tone exciting and urgent.
Cleans Claude‚Äôs response: removes formatting like **bold**, fixes < >, and adds HTML line breaks.
Sends the promotional message (lowest price product) to your Telegram channel or contact.
